languages.text: The character's WP is increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Increases the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +10 in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.
